problem_names:
lemma result_costD: assumes "result f_c = f" 
  "cost f_c \<le> b"
  "f_c = (a,c)"
shows "a = f" "c \<le> b"

lemma result_costD': assumes "result f_c = f \<and> cost f_c \<le> b"
  "f_c = (a,c)"
  shows "a = f" "c \<le> b"
translations:
proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. cost (a, c) = c &&& result (a, c) = a

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. snd (a, c) = c &&& fst (a, c) = a

lemma result_costD: assumes "result f_c = f" 
  "cost f_c \<le> b"
  "f_c = (a,c)"
shows "a = f" "c \<le> b"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a = f &&& c \<le> b

proof (prove)
using this:
  result f_c = f
  cost f_c \<le> b
  f_c = (a, c)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a = f &&& c \<le> b

lemma result_costD': assumes "result f_c = f \<and> cost f_c \<le> b"
  "f_c = (a,c)"
  shows "a = f" "c \<le> b"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a = f &&& c \<le> b

proof (prove)
using this:
  result f_c = f \<and> cost f_c \<le> b
  f_c = (a, c)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a = f &&& c \<le> b
